title: MyStocks Pro
summary: The most complete, beautiful and simple app to follow financial markets.
description: The most complete, beautiful and simple app to follow stock market and financial markets.Get quotes of stocks, funds, ETFs, currencies,futures and markets and manage your portfolios.Version pro, ad-free.Available free version, just look for "MyStocks", try it before buying.-Realtime quotes and charts of worldwide stocks, funds, ETFs, currencies,futures and markets (funds, futures and currencies may be delayed).-Material Design interface.-Customizable interface colors can ease problems of color blindness.-Android Wear app.-Alerts when stock hits target price  (in Android Marshmallow refresh could be delayed in doze mode).-Detailed financial data.-PreMarket and AfterHour quotes.-Stock news.-Daily quote update frequency: save battery and data, refreshing data only when you want to. During the weekend data sync is automatically paused.-All quotes are stored locally to save data traffic.-Daily and historical charts.-Technical analysis charts with indicators.-Portfolio with gain\loss positions and charts. -Multiple portfolios up to 6.-Automatic conversion from portfolio currency to main currency using real-time exchange rates.-Short selling positions supported.-Widgets with light and dark theme (only for android 4 or superior).-Backup\Restore data to SD.-Backup\Restore data to Google Drive.-DashClock extensions.-Keep your portfolio data safe with password protection.-AutoApps for Tasker plugin (requires Tasker and AutoApps).  See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZPW0yRHRT4About permissions- Network access: obviously requested to update data.- Wake-up phone: used only when an alert is set to notify the price target.- Vibration: used only when an alert is set to notify the price target.- Access to SD card: requested for backup-restore.Tips-Data are not updated\can't get notification in Android Marshmallow.If a user leaves a device unplugged and stationary for a period of time, with the screen off, the device enters Doze mode. in Doze mode network access is disabled and tasks are suspended.https://developer.android.com/preview/features/power-mgmt.html-Data are not refreshed every 30 seconds in Android Marshmallow.In Marshmallow minimum update frequency is 30 seconds.-I can't find any stock in my market, why?App uses free services to get quote data. Some markets like PSE are not covered and there's not much i can do. Those data are available only under subscription for professional purposes.Please don't give a bad rate because of that, it's not my fault.If you want to help me to localize it in your language please contact me.In case of crash please add your email to crash report so I can contact you.Communityhttps://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108446679929719127076Reviews:http://www.androidauthority.com/mystocks-review-523038/
descriptionHTML:
The most complete, beautiful and simple app to follow stock market and financial markets.
Get quotes of stocks, funds, ETFs, currencies,futures and markets and manage your portfolios.
Version pro, ad-free.
Available free version, just look for "MyStocks", try it before buying.

-Realtime quotes and charts of worldwide stocks, funds, ETFs, currencies,futures and markets (funds, futures and currencies may be delayed).
-Material Design interface.
-Customizable interface colors can ease problems of color blindness.
-Android Wear app.
-Alerts when stock hits target price (in Android Marshmallow refresh could be delayed in doze mode).
-Detailed financial data.
-PreMarket and AfterHour quotes.
-Stock news.
-Daily quote update frequency: save battery and data, refreshing data only when you want to. During the weekend data sync is automatically paused.
-All quotes are stored locally to save data traffic.
-Daily and historical charts.
-Technical analysis charts with indicators.
-Portfolio with gain\loss positions and charts.
-Multiple portfolios up to 6.
-Automatic conversion from portfolio currency to main currency using real-time exchange rates.
-Short selling positions supported.
-Widgets with light and dark theme (only for android 4 or superior).
-Backup\Restore data to SD.
-Backup\Restore data to Google Drive.
-DashClock extensions.
-Keep your portfolio data safe with password protection.
-AutoApps for Tasker plugin (requires Tasker and AutoApps).
See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZPW0yRHRT4

About permissions
- Network access: obviously requested to update data.
- Wake-up phone: used only when an alert is set to notify the price target.
- Vibration: used only when an alert is set to notify the price target.
- Access to SD card: requested for backup-restore.

Tips
-Data are not updated\can't get notification in Android Marshmallow.
If a user leaves a device unplugged and stationary for a period of time, with the screen off, the device enters Doze mode. in Doze mode network access is disabled and tasks are suspended.
https://developer.android.com/preview/features/power-mgmt.html


-Data are not refreshed every 30 seconds in Android Marshmallow.
In Marshmallow minimum update frequency is 30 seconds.

-I can't find any stock in my market, why?
App uses free services to get quote data. Some markets like PSE are not covered and there's not much i can do. Those data are available only under subscription for professional purposes.
Please don't give a bad rate because of that, it's not my fault.

If you want to help me to localize it in your language please contact me.
In case of crash please add your email to crash report so I can contact you.

Community
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108446679929719127076

Reviews:
http://www.androidauthority.com/mystocks-review-523038/
comments: Great stocks app so far, only problem I have found is the charts. Some stocks display the 1 and 5 day charts correctly, but the 1 month and 1 year charts are blank, other stocks are the exact opposite and only display the month/year charts while the day charts are blank.  Upgraded to five star due to quick response from dev
Great easy to read charts and handfuls of information, really complete.
Quality app Have been using this app for a few months now & have found it to be on No 1 stocks app. Comprehensive with helpful developer.
Fantastic Worth the price. Works brilliantly.
cool app exactly what i was looking for Great support for android wear and widgets..  It will be great if it can automatically pull my portfolio from Google finance as I do buy and sell stocks a lot.
